title: guruni smarimpumu
sahitya:
guruni smarimpumu manasA sadguruni smarimpumu


anupallavi

  gurutara bhuktitO jnAnnArtthi vagucu parama sushIluDai karuNAkaruDau 


caraNam 1    gAyaka sArva bhaumAdi ghana birudAnkituDau guNanidhini 
shrIyutuDai sadA shiSya samEtuDai shrYamosagu shrI rAma krSNa sad
    caraNam 2    sakalAgma nigama sAra samyuta sangIta sAdhanatO sadgatikai 
sadamala dharma niyama samyutuDai sadA muraLI gAna vilOluDau
